summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackTreat acne and breakouts with this exfoliating cleanser from Good Molecules. The Acne Foaming Cleanser is a fluffy foaming cleanser powered by 2% salicylic acid - an anti-inflammatory and antimicrobial ingredient that exfoliates on the skin's surface and deep within pores.
details: DetailsBenefitsRich foaming formula gently removes surface oil, impurities, and buildup, leaving skin soft and comfortably clean.Free of soap, fragrance, and harsh cleansing agents.Key Ingredients2% salicylic acid (aka beta hydroxy acid or BHA) exfoliates away dead skin cells while unclogging pores for visibly smoother, clearer skin.Item 2601250How To UseGently massage into wet skin for 20-30 seconds. Rinse thoroughly and pat dry. Can be used in the morning and/or at night.Precautions: For external use only.IngredientsWater, Propanediol, Sodium Lauryl Glucose Carboxylate, Lauryl Glucoside, Salicylic Acid, Glycerin, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Gluconate, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Leaf Extract, Sorbic Acid, Organic Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Citric Acid.
how_to_use: Gently massage into wet skin for 20-30 seconds. Rinse thoroughly and pat dry. Can be used in the morning and/or at night.Precautions: For external use only.
ingredients: Organic Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder

reviews.headline: this changed my life!!!
reviews.comments: i love love love this

reviews.headline: literally changed my whole life !!
reviews.comments: this product has been my holy Grail. I've tried so many different acne products, and it never helped my face but once I tried this, it completely cleared my acne. I have had multiple people give me compliments on my face who have seen me before and after using this product, my acne would hurt by just touching it and i would even get cystic acne and now my face is so bright and clear. I still can't believe it. The one thing I will say is that my face had to get used to the product because it used to be pretty red for a few minutes after I washed it, but no more redness.

reviews.headline: Great for my acne.
reviews.comments: This has been working so well.

reviews.headline: Do not use, chemical burn
reviews.comments: I used this product once and it immediately statted burning my face the moment it touched my skin. Even though I washed it off fast, it fave me a chemical butn and left me with stringing, swollen, and very red face.

reviews.headline: What I've Been Looking For..
reviews.comments:
I got into the good molecules brand recently since wanting to try cleaner products. For the longest time I did not want to give
 up my OG cleanser but it wasnt working for me anymore. I read the reviews of this cleanser and noticed for most people it was a hit or miss, but it seemed to work for people with an oily combination acne prone skin type, which is what I have. So I took the chance and bought it and im here to second that!! I had bumps all over my forehead and consistant breakouts on my chin and after using this product i noticed quick results. After about a month my forehead is completely smooth, my skin tends fo be significantly less oily, and my breakouts are less consistant. I love this stuff!!!!

reviews.headline: Love this stuff
reviews.comments: I've been trying to find something that truly worked and the nice lady at ulta showed me this and it's amazing at how fast it's help clear my face up and levels my skin soft and one squirt will do the whole face

reviews.headline: Great for combo-oily
reviews.comments: I use this cleanser in the warm weather and the hydrating cleanser in the colder months. Controls oil and breakouts.

reviews.headline: Great for combo-oily
reviews.comments: I use this cleanser in the warm weather and the hydrating cleanser in the colder months. Controls oil and breakouts.

reviews.headline: BURNED!!
reviews.comments: Used this about 4 times and each time burned my skin. Was severely red

reviews.headline: Good for Oily and Combination Skin
reviews.comments: I have oily combination skin. The foam helps remove the oilyness (which causes acne) from my skin, and has helped clear up my face. Salicylic is a exfoliant if your face feels dry thats because its removing the dead skin and debris, thats normal. I like to use a gentle cleanser in am and my salicylic in pm. Also remember to wear your spf while on this cleanser, since this bha will increase your skin sensitivity to the sun. :) 10/10

reviews.headline: Clean skin
reviews.comments: This face wash is what I've been looking for. My forehead was bumpy with texture, not really with acne, but with this it's all smooth

reviews.headline: It smells bad and it dried up quick
reviews.comments: It foams up but as soon ad you start scrubbing it, the foam dissolves. You have to use a crazy amout for no result.

reviews.headline: I have bought this product again
reviews.comments: Been using good molecules for going on 2 months and my skin I have seen tremendous change my acne is clearing up thanks to good molecule

reviews.headline: Didn't like
reviews.comments: I wanted to like this product but felt it didn't aid in removing makeup and only left my skin red. I didn't use all the product before throwing it away and finding a different product.

reviews.headline: Perfect for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: I use this when I am experiencing normal breakout and it works beautifully. Very easy on the skin and not over drying. I use twice a week to maintain acne on my forehead and jawline

faceoff_positive.comments: I have issues with hyper pigmentation and in grown hairs around my chin. As a woman of color been suffering with skin issues since I was a baby. It is embarrassing for a woman in her 40s to have acne like a teenager. I have tried products lgot some results over a long period of time, but cannot afford their high prices being on a budget. I noticed after one week of using the serum it appeared my skin was clearing but there were still bumpd. Then something weird happened, I had never before experienced. The bumps on my face started to dry out and harden. Like it kind of hurt a little bit only on the bumps that were drying. I washed my face felt a small tug. Look on my finger and it was a very long hair wrapped in dried skin. The serum worked üí™� to heal my skin to the point where it pushed out a half inch ingrown hair culprit, while I was washing my face. Ingrown hairs HURT and are irritating. After that it left behind smooth clear skin in the once infected area. I will be a repeat customer and will refer others to try the product. It's amazing and I did not have high hopes at all.
faceoff_positive.headline: Good Molecules Correcting Serum

faceoff_negative.comments: I've used many products with salicylic acid in the past, but this is the only one that has ever given me a bad reaction. My face started to feel hot within seconds of putting this product on then started to burn. I rinsed the foam off in what was probably less than 10 seconds hoping that would stop the hot sensation on my face. The feeling didn't go away and actually began burning after a minute. The discomfort this product caused lingered for about half an hour even after applying some aloe to soothe the burning. I have somewhat sensitive skin so I figured the product just wasn't meant for my kind of skin and gave it to my sister. Her skin is "normal" and she had the same thing happen to her. This was a disappointing product after having read so many good reviews. This may work for many people, but I've never had such a bad reaction to a product, even with my sensitive skin, so I would proceed with caution when buying this.
faceoff_negative.headline: Bad Reaction
